Nobody wanted to give him a CHANCE.
I go to a barbershop to get a haircut.
There is a long line and 3 barbers, 2 in their 30s and 1 young man about 18 year old.
No customer wants to go to him, they all rather wait in a long line.
He gives me a great haircut, probably the best ever.
I give him a great tip and ask him where he learned the trade.
He says he is from a family of barbers and has been cutting hair in the family since he was 7.
As soon as I get up, the next customer jumps into the young man's chair.

Today a few months¬† later I come to the same barbershop. This time I have to wait to get into the young man's chair. He tells me thank you and¬† that ever since he gave me that haircut, his business suddenly boomed.
Giving someone a CHANCE they deserve does bigger wonders.

Specialize in identifying perfect candidates AKA unicorns for job positions in the technology industry. Work directly with both hiring managers and candidates to ensure a great fit between employee and job role and play a significant role in the hiring process Responsible for recruiting IT and Engineering professionals for clientele based across the United States, primarily in the Greater Salt Lake Area that consist of 3 counties | Davis | Salt Lake | Utah  - Full Cycle recruitment - Maintain book of business.- Place qualified professionals in contract, contract-hire, and permanent positions- Build relationships with potential candidates and maintain a pipeline of pre-qualified candidates through networking, employee referrals, and cold calls.- Participate in training and creation of company procedures (new hires, database rules, improved communication via separate departments within company, etc.)- Negotiate compensation, benefits, PTO, relocation assistance, start date, counter offers, and growth potential with candidates throughout screening and offer stages.- Establish an essential relationship with each Account Executive as to gather information regarding each hiring managers need, and to help identify any realistic expectations that need to be given due to compensation changes, skill sets desired, etc. of candidates presented.

summary: My passion is finding people jobs and making sure I have fulfilled each individuals needs/wants to go with their career advancement. I strive to make sure every candidate I place is happy in the company I put them in. It is the best feeling having conversations with candidates and getting to know what drives them, makes them happy, what their passionate about, etc. and then put my recruiting expertise into play and match them with a hiring manager looking for their type of talent. Nothing better then waking up every morning having the chance to work with great co-workers day to day and work with great IT talent out here in Salt Lake City to help them advance in their career and give their family a stable/enjoyable life.ConsultNet offers IT and Engineering professional services to startup, midmarket, and Fortune 1000 companies in North America. We specialize in providing thoughtful and effective solutions for our clients and rewarding opportunities for our consultants. We are the proud recipient of both the Talent and Client 2016 Best of Staffing awards, and the 2014 and 2015 TechServe Alliance Excellence awards. We're a principled talent acquisition and consulting firm that combines professional integrity with technical and industry expertise.ConsultNet.com https://www.glassdoor.com/Reviews/ConsultNet-Reviews-E32109.htmIf you have any further questions, please reach out to me 801-997-6245 / 801-209-7142 / chebert@consultnet.com
